name: Digital Mortar, Inc.
description: Developer of an in-store customer tracking system designed to provide full path customer analytics. The company's full SaaS in-store customer tracking system includes video and camera tracking and is designed to provide robust cloud-based data collection and integration of (PoS), enabling brick-and-mortar retailers to drive store layout, merchandising, and staff optimization.
